item.description:
Note: This event requires a reservation and it may or may not require a deposit by the organizer so all cancellations within 48 hours of the event requires a reason. Please do not sign up unless you are sure that you can make it.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The membership has voted! The June Restaurant of the month is Gauchos Churrascaria.

About the Restaurant of the Month:

At Gauchos Churrascaria, NH's premier Brazilian Steak House, you're treated to authentic Brazilian food, an inviting atmosphere, and outstanding service.

WHY VISIT GAUCHOS?
We're not your ordinary steak house. At most restaurants, by the time you reach the center of your cut, the meat lacks the heat that delivers its best flavor. At Gauchos, our servers provide continuous table side service, gallantly walking among the dining room with sizzling skewers of the hottest, most delicious rotisserie-cooked meat. Every bite is perfection.

Our fixed-price* offers something for everyone. An expansive selection of homemade salads with fresh fruits and vegetables, as well as sides of fried plantains, yucca, papa criolla (baby yellow potatoes), black beans, and rice complement our menu. Join us for a taste of Brazil's famous caipirinha or any of our fine wines and beverages, and don't forget to save room for dessert or a cup of Starbucks coffee.

Whether you want to enjoy a romantic evening, a good time with friends, or a family night out, come dine with us and experience authentic Brazilian cuisine, music, and service unlike anywhere else in the greater Boston area.

http://www.gauchosbra...

item.name: FAN Restaurant of the Month
